Web server turns PostgreSQL into a RESTful API
Backend as Server based on Node

overview.overview: PostgREST is a standalone web server that turns your PostgreSQL database directly into a RESTful API. The structural constraints and permissions in the database determine the API endpoints and operations.

childMarkdownRemark.html: PostgREST is an open-source tool that turns your PostgreSQL database directly into a RESTful API. The basic idea is that rather than writing backend code to interact with your database, you can simply configure PostgREST and it will provide a web API interface automatically, based on the structure of your database.
